name: Maelstrom Wanderer
text:
Creatures you control have haste.
Cascade, cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order. Then do it again.)

name: Maga, Traitor to Mortals
text:
Maga, Traitor to Mortals enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
When Maga enters the battlefield, target player loses life equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on it.

name: Magebane Armor
text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+4 and loses flying.
Prevent all noncombat damage that would be dealt to equipped creature.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Magefire Wings
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has flying.

editions.flavor: Giving a thing wings does not take away its fear of flight—or its fear of fire, for that matter.

name: Mage il-Vec
text: {T}, Discard a card at random: Mage il-Vec deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

editions.flavor: Living below a flowstone foundry produces a disproportionate number of fire mages among the il.
Living below a flowstone foundry produces a disproportionate number of fire mages among the il.

name: Mage-Ring Bully
text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Mage-Ring Bully attacks each turn if able.

editions.flavor: "Don't be rude, Beleren. We just want to enjoy the view with you."

name: Mage-Ring Network
text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{1}, {T}: Put a storage counter on Mage-Ring Network.
{T}, Remove any number of storage counters from Mage-Ring Network: Add {C} to your mana pool for each storage counter removed this way.

name: Mage-Ring Responder
text:
Mage-Ring Responder doesn't untap during your untap step.
{7}: Untap Mage-Ring Responder.
Whenever Mage-Ring Responder attacks, it deals 7 damage to target creature defending player controls.

name: Mages' Contest
text: You and target spell's controller bid life. You start the bidding with a bid of 1. In turn order, each player may top the high bid. The bidding ends if the high bid stands. The high bidder loses life equal to the high bid. If you win the bidding, counter that spell.

name: Mage's Guile
text:
Target creature gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Cycling {U} ({U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

editions.flavor: "Next time, don't bother."

name: Mage Slayer
text:
Whenever equipped creature attacks, it deals damage equal to its power to defending player.
Equip {3}

editions.flavor:
"When the wielder is strong enough, any sword will do."
—Kresh the Bloodbraided

"When the wielder is strong enough, any sword will do."
—Kresh the Bloodbraided

name: Mageta's Boon
text:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.

editions.flavor:
When the Lion roars, his cubs grow stronger.
—Kipamu saying

name: Mageta the Lion
text: {2}{W}{W}, {T}, Discard two cards: Destroy all creatures except for Mageta the Lion. Those creatures can't be regenerated.

editions.flavor: In the jungle of war there is always a Lion.

name: Magewright's Stone
text: {1}, {T}: Untap target creature that has an activated ability with {T} in its cost.

editions.flavor: The stones hark back to an age before civilization, when the living earth blessed all who trod its untamed wilds.

name: Maggot Carrier
text: When Maggot Carrier enters the battlefield, each player loses 1 life.

editions.flavor:
"The mere sight of our undead allies sickens me. What unholy bargain have you struck?"
—Grizzlegom, to Agnate

"We do not suddenly fall on death, but advance towards it by slight degrees; we die every day."
—Seneca, Epistles, trans. Gummere

name: Maggot Therapy
text:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/-2.

editions.flavor:
"If this is the cure, I'd hate to see the disease."
—Orim

name: Magical Hack
text: Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one basic land type with another. (For example, you may change "swampwalk" to "plainswalk." This effect lasts indefinitely.)

name: Magical Hacker
text: {U}: Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of + with -, and vice versa, until end of turn.

name: Magister of Worth
text:
Flying
Will of the council — When Magister of Worth enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player votes for grace or condemnation. If grace gets more votes, each player returns each creature card from his or her graveyard to the battlefield. If condemnation gets more votes or the vote is tied, destroy all creatures other than Magister of Worth.

name: Magister Sphinx
text:
Flying
When Magister Sphinx enters the battlefield, target player's life total becomes 10.

editions.flavor: "These benighted worlds are thick with ignorance. I will educate them. They will listen, or they will die."
"These benighted worlds are thick with ignorance. I will educate them. They will listen, or they will die."

name: Magistrate's Scepter
text:
{4}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Magistrate's Scepter.
{T}, Remove three charge counters from Magistrate's Scepter: Take an extra turn after this one.

name: Magistrate's Veto
text: White creatures and blue creatures can't block.

editions.flavor: The magistrate had been the goblins' puppet for so long that he made the right decisions with little prompting.

name: Magma Burst
text:
Kicker—Sacrifice two lands. (You may sacrifice two lands in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.)
Magma Burst deals 3 damage to target creature or player. If Magma Burst was kicked, it deals 3 damage to another target creature or player.

name: Magma Giant
text: When Magma Giant enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.

editions.flavor: Its open mouth is a furnace blast that blisters the skin. Its smoking fists are meteors that split the earth.
Its open mouth is a furnace blast that blisters the skin. Its smoking fists are meteors that split the earth.

name: Magma Jet
text: Magma Jet deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

editions.set: Duel Decks Anthology, Jace vs. Chandra

name: Magma Mine
text:
{4}: Put a pressure counter on Magma Mine.
{T}, Sacrifice Magma Mine: Magma Mine deals damage equal to the number of pressure counters on it to target creature or player.

editions.flavor: BOOM!

name: Magma Phoenix
text:
Flying
When Magma Phoenix dies, it deals 3 damage to each creature and each player.
{3}{R}{R}: Return Magma Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Magmaquake
text: Magmaquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each planeswalker.

editions.flavor:
"Where will you run when I punish you with the very ground you flee on?"
—Nicol Bolas

"Where will you run when I punish you with the very ground you flee on?"
—Nicol Bolas
"Where will you run when I punish you with the very ground you flee on?"—Nicol Bolas

name: Magma Rift
text:
As an additional cost to cast Magma Rift, sacrifice a land.
Magma Rift deals 5 damage to target creature.

editions.flavor:
"Lighting a fire needs kindling and heat. You be the kindling. I'll bring the heat."
—Chandra Nalaar

name: Magmasaur
text:
Magmasaur enters the battlefield with five +1/+1 counters on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may remove a +1/+1 counter from Magmasaur. If you don't, sacrifice Magmasaur and it deals damage equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on it to each creature without flying and each player.

name: Magma Sliver
text: All Slivers have "{T}: Target Sliver creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of Slivers on the battlefield."

editions.flavor: As malleable as molten steel, but as dangerous as the finished blade.

name: Magma Spray
text: Magma Spray deals 2 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

editions.flavor: A stone hurled at an enemy is deadlier in liquid form.
The ancient dragon Thraxes sleeps in Purphoros's sacred peak. When he stirs in dreams, so does the mountain.

"Jund is a wounded world. Beware its searing blood spilling out onto the surface."
—Rakka Mar

"Jund is a wounded world. Beware its searing blood spilling out onto the surface."
—Rakka Mar

name: Magmatic Chasm
text: Creatures without flying can't block this turn.

editions.flavor:
"Our shamans assert their mastery over the land, thwarting the lesser clans' attempts to stand in the way of our dragonlord."
—Allek, Atarka hunter
The Needle's Eye, a seldom-used passage that winds through Stensia's mountains, carries travelers close to Ashmouth—too close, some would argue.

name: Magmatic Core
text:
Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
At the beginning of your end step, Magmatic Core deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures, where X is the number of age counters on it.

name: Magmatic Force
text: At the beginning of each upkeep, Magmatic Force deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

editions.flavor:
"Granted, it's the pinnacle of utter destructiveness. So what would you call two of them?"
—Riku of Two Reflections

name: Magmatic Insight
text:
As an additional cost to cast Magmatic Insight, discard a land card.
Draw two cards.

editions.flavor: Chief among the tenets of Purphoros is that one must destroy in order to create.

name: Magma Vein
text: {R}, Sacrifice a land: Magma Vein deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.

editions.flavor:
Standing near a volcano
—Barbarian expression meaning
"asking for it"

name: Magmaw
text: {1}, Sacrifice a nonland permanent: Magmaw deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

editions.flavor:
"The purpose of existence is simple: everything is fuel for the magmaw."
—Jaji, magmaw worshipper

"The purpose of existence is simple: everything is fuel for the magmaw."
—Jaji, magmaw worshipper

name: Magnetic Flux
text: Artifact creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.

editions.flavor: After the researcher's astonishing success, his assistants spent six hours finding a way to return the specimens safely to the ground.

name: Magnetic Mine
text: Whenever another artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, Magnetic Mine deals 2 damage to that artifact's controller.

name: Magnetic Mountain
text:
Blue creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may choose any number of tapped blue creatures he or she controls and pay {4} for each creature chosen this way. If the player does, untap those creatures.

name: Magnetic Theft
text: Attach target Equipment to target creature. (Control of the Equipment doesn't change.)

editions.flavor: Among the Vulshok, the most prized blades are those that killed their original owners.

name: Magnetic Web
text:
If a creature with a magnet counter on it attacks, all creatures with magnet counters on them attack if able.
Whenever a creature with a magnet counter on it attacks, all creatures with magnet counters on them block that creature this turn if able.
{1}, {T}: Put a magnet counter on target creature.

name: Magnify
text: All creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: The seed torches' pollen gives off light, but the elves find it heightens their senses as well.

name: Magnifying Glass
text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{4}, {T}: Investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

editions.flavor: Knight-Inquisitors of Saint Raban delve deep into mysteries best left unexplored.

name: Magnigoth Treefolk
text: Domain — For each basic land type among lands you control, Magnigoth Treefolk has landwalk of that type. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a land of that type.)

name: Magnivore
text:
Haste (This creature can attack the turn it comes under your control.)
Magnivore's power and toughness are each equal to the number of sorcery cards in all graveyards.

name: Magosi, the Waterveil
text:
Magosi, the Waterveil enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.
{U}, {T}: Put an eon counter on Magosi, the Waterveil. Skip your next turn.
{T}, Remove an eon counter from Magosi, the Waterveil and return it to its owner's hand: Take an extra turn after this one.

name: Magus of the Abyss
text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, destroy target nonartifact creature that player controls of his or her choice. It can't be regenerated.

editions.flavor: He climbs a staircase of falling souls, fighting the continuous pull of the void.

name: Magus of the Arena
text: {3}, {T}: Tap target creature you control and target creature of an opponent's choice he or she controls. Those creatures fight each other. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

editions.flavor: The magus still hears the roar of the crowds. They're gone, but the will to compete remains.
The magus still hears the roar of the crowds. They're gone, but the will to compete remains.

name: Magus of the Bazaar
text: {T}: Draw two cards, then discard three cards.

editions.flavor: "Some trade in goods, some in secrets. My soul has walked the futures, and I offer the rare coin of possibility."

name: Magus of the Candelabra
text: {X}, {T}: Untap X target lands.

editions.flavor:
"What would Urza think, I wonder, if he could hear how the nature mages still snarl at his name, but venerate the work of his apprentice?"
—Teferi, to Jhoira

name: Magus of the Coffers
text: {2}, {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool for each Swamp you control.

editions.flavor: All that remains of the Cabal are the echoes in its deepest vault. Yet those who hear the echoes feel a power undiminished by the dust of ages.
All that remains of the Cabal are the echoes in its deepest vault. Yet those who hear the echoes feel a power undiminished by the dust of ages.

name: Magus of the Disk
text:
Magus of the Disk enters the battlefield tapped.
{1}, {T}: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments.

editions.flavor: Studying the journals of the necromage Nevinyrral leaves disciples gripped with the urge to exercise his draconian judgment.

name: Magus of the Future
text:
Play with the top card of your library revealed.
You may play the top card of your library.

editions.flavor: Those gifted with the sight have one eye in the present and the other in the future.

name: Magus of the Jar
text: {T}, Sacrifice Magus of the Jar: Each player exiles all cards from his or her hand face down and draws seven cards. At the beginning of the next end step, each player discards his or her hand and returns to his or her hand each card he or she exiled this way.

name: Magus of the Library
text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if you have exactly seven cards in hand.

editions.flavor: The ancient books slowly crumbled, their secrets turning to dust. But their every word sings within the magus's head.

name: Magus of the Mirror
text: {T}, Sacrifice Magus of the Mirror: Exchange life totals with target opponent. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

editions.flavor: "Behold! The image of the enemy and all that she has. Trust your envy, and take it."
"Behold! The image of the enemy and all that she has. Trust your envy, and take it."

name: Magus of the Moat
text: Creatures without flying can't attack.

editions.flavor: "The spirits of the mythic ones ever circle their beloved keep, forbidding entry to all who come with the heavy tread of hate."

name: Magus of the Moon
text: Nonbasic lands are Mountains.

editions.flavor: Tidal forces of the blood moon wrench and buckle the land, drawing monoliths of stone and soil toward the flaming orb.

name: Magus of the Scroll
text: {3}, {T}: Name a card. Reveal a card at random from your hand. If it's the named card, Magus of the Scroll deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

name: Magus of the Tabernacle
text: All creatures have "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this creature unless you pay {1}."

editions.flavor: The Tabernacle's disciples channel the emanations from Pendrell Vale, spreading its paradoxical demand to be both worshipped and left alone.

name: Magus of the Unseen
text: {1}{U}, {T}: Untap target artifact an opponent controls and gain control of it until end of turn. It gains haste until end of turn. When you lose control of the artifact, tap it.

name: Magus of the Vineyard
text: At the beginning of each player's precombat main phase, add {G}{G} to that player's mana pool.

editions.flavor: Battered and beaten by years of salt and claw, he never ceased to walk, and to seed. Only now, in this time of rebirth, do his seeds take root.
Battered and beaten by years of salt and claw, he never ceased to walk, and to seed. Only now, in this time of rebirth, do his seeds take root.

name: Magus of the Wheel
text: {1}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Magus of the Wheel: Each player discards his or her hand, then draws seven cards.

editions.flavor: "Fate is not as fixed as you might think."

name: Magus of the Will
text: {2}{B}, {T}, Exile Magus of the Will: Until end of turn, you may play cards from your graveyard. If a card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn, exile that card instead.

editions.flavor: "These eyes have shown me the flaws of flesh."

name: Mahamoti Djinn
text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

editions.flavor: Of royal blood among the spirits of the air, the Mahamoti djinn rides on the wings of the winds. As dangerous in the gambling hall as he is in battle, he is a master of trickery and misdirection.
Of royal blood among the spirits of the air, the Mahamoti djinn rides on the wings of the winds. As dangerous in the gambling hall as he is in battle, he is a master of trickery and misdirection.

name: Major Teroh
text:
Flying
{3}{W}{W}, Sacrifice Major Teroh: Exile all black creatures.

editions.flavor: "I am the holy wind that shall avenge the Cabal's victims."

name: Make a Stand
text: Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)

editions.flavor: For a moment they stood tall, all fear forgotten.

name: Make a Wish
text: Return two cards at random from your graveyard to your hand.

editions.flavor: In Gavony wishing is taken as a sign of weakness, yet the wells usually brim with silver.

name: Make Mischief
text: Make Mischief deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Create a 1/1 red Devil creature token. It has "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to target creature or player."

editions.flavor: A tidy desk is as good as an invitation.

name: Make Obsolete
text: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: Yesterday's marvels are today's antiques.

name: Makeshift Mannequin
text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a mannequin counter on it. For as long as that creature has a mannequin counter on it, it has "When this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it."

editions.flavor:
"This vulgar mimicry will end now."
—Desmera, perfect of Wren's Run

"This vulgar mimicry will end now."
—Desmera, perfect of Wren's Run

name: Makeshift Mauler
text: As an additional cost to cast Makeshift Mauler, exile a creature card from your graveyard.

editions.flavor:
"It always amazes me what perfectly good things people throw away."
—Ludevic, necro-alchemist

"It always amazes me what perfectly good things people throw away."
—Ludevic, necro-alchemist

name: Makindi Aeronaut
text: Flying

editions.flavor: "The Eldrazi have surprised us before. It's my job to make sure that never happens again."

name: Makindi Griffin
text: Flying

editions.flavor: As the hedrons began to coalesce into colossal Eldrazi superstructures, the griffins were forced to seek new territory lest their aeries be crushed between the massive stone monoliths.
As the hedrons began to coalesce into colossal Eldrazi superstructures, the griffins were forced to seek new territory lest their aeries be crushed between the massive stone monoliths.

name: Makindi Patrol
text: Rally — Whenever Makindi Patrol or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.

editions.flavor: Working with his noble mount, he notices every form on the horizon, every scent in the air, every tremor in the earth.

name: Makindi Shieldmate
text:
Defender
Whenever Makindi Shieldmate or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Makindi Shieldmate.

editions.flavor: The more who rely on him, the more resolute he becomes.

name: Makindi Sliderunner
text:
Trample
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Makindi Sliderunner gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: After a battle, it breaks the hillsides into manageable pieces to prepare for next time.

name: Malachite Golem
text: {1}{G}: Malachite Golem gains trample until end of turn.

editions.flavor: Centuries before the first branches of the Tangle gave shelter from the suns' cold light, the shadows of golems were Mirrodin's only shade.

name: Malachite Talisman
text: Whenever a player casts a green spell, you may pay {3}. If you do, untap target permanent.

name: Malach of the Dawn
text:
Flying
{W}{W}{W}: Regenerate Malach of the Dawn.

editions.flavor:
"The sun rises, but the world still feels dark. Pray for the arrival of the malachim—they'll bring Dawn to the world and to our hearts."
—Sister Betje, Miracles of the Saints

name: Malakir Bloodwitch
text:
Flying, protection from white
When Malakir Bloodwitch enters the battlefield, each opponent loses life equal to the number of Vampires you control. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

name: Malakir Cullblade
text: Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Malakir Cullblade.

editions.flavor: Each cut stains his blade with fresh blood that he samples to increase his strength.

name: Malakir Familiar
text:
Flying, deathtouch
Whenever you gain life, Malakir Familiar gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: "They are deadly, and they are loyal. We can spare them a little blood."—Harak, Malakir bloodwitch

name: Malakir Soothsayer
text: Cohort — {T}, Tap an untapped Ally you control: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.

editions.flavor: "Your blood whispers secrets your mind could never comprehend."

name: Malevolent Awakening
text: {1}{B}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

editions.flavor: The most popular pit fighters are brought back for encore performances.

name: Malevolent Whispers
text:
Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn. 
Madness {3}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

name: Malfegor
text:
Flying
When Malfegor enters the battlefield, discard your hand. Each opponent sacrifices a creature for each card discarded this way.

editions.flavor: A demon cannot be trusted, and a dragon will not be ruled.
A demon cannot be trusted, and a dragon will not be ruled.
A demon cannot be trusted, and a dragon will not be ruled.

name: Malfegor Avatar
text:
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if it was unearthed, it gets +3/+0.
Whenever a creature you control is exiled, if it was unearthed, shuffle that card into its owner's library.

editions.flavor: CON Participation Avatar

name: Malfunction
text:
Enchant artifact or creature
When Malfunction enters the battlefield, tap enchanted permanent.
Enchanted permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

editions.flavor: "They don't make them like they used to."

name: Malice
text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

editions.set: Duel Decks: Ajani vs. Nicol Bolas

name: Malicious Advice
text: Tap X target artifacts, creatures, and/or lands. You lose X life.

editions.flavor:
"Rule through fear, Darigaaz. Only if the dragons feel terror will they truly be your servants."
—Tevesh Szat

name: Malicious Affliction
text:
Morbid — When you cast Malicious Affliction, if a creature died this turn, you may copy Malicious Affliction and may choose a new target for the copy.
Destroy target nonblack creature.

editions.flavor:
"Such an affliction appears to seek out the pure."
—Byro, plague doctor

"Such an affliction appears to seek out the pure."
—Byro, plague doctor

name: Malicious Intent
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: Target creature can't block this turn."

editions.flavor: As peace returned to Thraben, some cathars made the mistake of letting down their guard.

name: Malignant Growth
text:
Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a growth counter on Malignant Growth.
At the beginning of each opponent's draw step, that player draws an additional card for each growth counter on Malignant Growth, then Malignant Growth deals damage to the player equal to the number of cards he or she drew this way.

name: Malignus
text:
Malignus's power and toughness are each equal to half the highest life total among your opponents, rounded up.
Damage that would be dealt by Malignus can't be prevented.

editions.flavor: It descended on Estwald like a sudden storm. Moments later, only ashes and agony remained.

name: Mammoth Harness
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature loses flying.
Whenever enchanted creature blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, the other creature gains first strike until end of turn.

name: Mammoth Umbra
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has vigilance.
Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

name: Manabarbs
text: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, Manabarbs deals 1 damage to that player.
